New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists, nearly notching a triple-double in the first half and securing his 144th career triple-double early in the third quarter.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets broke open the game with a 39-14 run in the third quarter, during which Trae Young was called for a technical foul and De'Andre Hunter drew a technical for flopping.
Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense during pre-game preparations.
Post-Match Reflections: Russell Westbrook added 16 points and 11 assists, contributing to the Nuggets' 2-0 season record against the Hawks, with a previous win of 141-111 on December 8, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trae Young had 30 points and nine assists, extending his streak of 193 consecutive games with five or more assists, the third-longest in NBA history.
Others: The Nuggets finished a perfect 21 of 21 from the free throw line and set a season-high in assists with 44.
